definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: You pretend to be pure also will not hide the fact that your coquettish.
sentences.chinese: 你假装清纯也掩盖不了你那风骚的事实。

sentences.english: Woman, don't take your pure to meet the man.
sentences.chinese: 女人，别拿你们的清纯来满足男人的荷尔蒙。

sentences.english: Ground of Yang Rui hopeless fell in love with clean workingwoman of Qing Chun to set one's mind at.
sentences.chinese: 杨瑞不可救药地爱上了清纯的清洁女工安心。

sentences.english: Kit Kat Wizard of thousands of Rime, the simple and honest clumsy shrubs pure heaven.
sentences.chinese: 精灵奇巧的雾凇千姿百态，笨拙憨厚的灌木清纯天成。

sentences.english: Once, we also and children, like, has a pair of pure eyes.
sentences.chinese: 曾经，我们也和孩子们一样，有着一双清纯的眼神。

sentences.english: The look from her eye is still so pure, like a dustless crystal.
sentences.chinese: 她的眼神依旧清纯，仿佛水晶般纤尘不染。

sentences.english: So pure romance, sweet and astringent taste, never returned.
sentences.chinese: 那么清纯的恋情，甜涩的滋味，一去不返。

sentences.english: Walking in the rain, I can feel your breath, pure and humid.
sentences.chinese: 走在雨中，我可以感觉到你的气息，清纯而潮湿。

sentences.english: Her name is derived from a flower's name. (Ericaceous Erica) It's said that she has a frank character in contrast with her girlish appearance.
sentences.chinese: 据说外表虽有如少女般的清纯，但性格却是粗枝大叶。
